title: Antibody testing for coronavirus still has 'a way to go', experts say. This is what's worrying them
description: Testing for coronavirus antibodies is ramping up overseas, but experts say simply finding those antibodies does not tell us how long a person might be immune to COVID-19.
content:
Posted 
April 21, 2020 16:44:47
In hard-hit parts of the United States, including New York, authorities are ramping up another type of testing as they battle coronavirus.
They're not looking for the virus itself; they're searching for antibodies.
New York… [+4568 chars]
